description: This file contains the core game logic for implementing the 2048 game, including move execution, tile merging, spawning new tiles, and tracking game state changes without any Flutter dependencies.

classes.name: GameLogic
classes.description: Provides static methods for creating new game boards, executing moves, and handling game mechanics.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Creates a new game board with two initial tiles placed at random positions.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Executes a move in a specified direction, updates the board accordingly, and handles spawning of new tiles.

methods.name: _diffGetNewTile
methods.description: Identifies the newly spawned tile by comparing the board states before and after a move.

methods.name: _compressAndMergeLine
methods.description: Compresses a line of tiles towards an index, merges tiles with identical values, and calculates the score gained.

methods.name: _applyLineResultRow
methods.description: Applies the compressed and merged line results to a specific row on the board, updating tile positions and recording moves/merges.

methods.name: _applyLineResultCol
methods.description: Applies the compressed and merged line results to a specific column on the board.

methods.name: _spawnRandom
methods.description: Spawns a new tile (2 or 4) at a random empty cell on the board.
